post:
# Features

- SolusVM Powered (Working on own panel ... but we can only provide SolusVM now)
- Owned IP addresses and ASN (AS57695 / AS57578)
- Native IPv6
- BGP Session Available (15 USD Setup Fee Per Account)
- 3 day Money Back Guarantee
- Full root access
- Customized Infrastructure (Cached Mirror, DNS)

# Offers

Payment Method: Credit Card (via Stripe), Alipay

## Nano (Khabarovsk, RU)

- CPU **1 vCPU**
- RAM **1 GiB **
- Storage **8 GiB SAS**
- Bandwidth **512 GiB (In + Out)**
- Uplink **2 x 1Gbps (Capped to 500Mbps)**
- IPv4 1 * /32
- IPv6 1 * /64
- Unmanaged
- **No** DDoS Protection (We **don't** provide DDos Protection)

Pricing: $5 / mo, $50 / $yr

BGP Session is also available in this region, and we can only provide default route only now.

Looking Glass: http://ru-khv01.lg.zeptovm.com/

Test IP: 185.209.84.233 / 2a0b:4342:4000:233::

[Purchase](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=44)
